metadata.title: Healthcare HIPAA Compliance Training
metadata.scenario: Senior Learning Director at Regional Health System
metadata.description: 500+ healthcare workers needing HIPAA compliance training

sections.title: Learning Objectives & Outcomes
sections.description: Define specific, measurable learning outcomes aligned with Regional Health System's Healthcare context to address mandatory HIPAA compliance training for 500+ clinical and administrative staff

questions.label: As Learning Director at Regional Health System, what are your primary learning objectives for this 501-1000 learner HIPAA compliance initiative?
questions.helpText: Select all objectives that align with addressing mandatory HIPAA compliance training. Consider your $250K-$1M budget and HIPAA, SOC 2 requirements.

options.label: Knowledge Acquisition
options.description: Build foundational understanding of HIPAA privacy and security rules, PHI handling protocols

options.label: Practical Skill Development
options.description: Develop hands-on abilities for secure data handling on Desktop, Laptop, Tablet platforms

options.label: Regulatory Compliance
options.description: Achieve 100% compliance certification within regulatory deadlines

options.label: Performance Improvement
options.description: Measurable reduction in privacy incidents and security violations

metadata.contextSource: role=Learning Director, org=Regional Health System, gap=HIPAA compliance, sector=Healthcare

questions.label: Given your learners' current 2/5 knowledge level, what Bloom's taxonomy level should objectives target?
questions.helpText: Starting from level 2/5 (Beginner), determine appropriate cognitive complexity for 3-5 hours weekly learning time

questions.label: What is your expected ROI timeframe for this Healthcare compliance initiative?
questions.helpText: Consider your $250K-$1M budget and 501-1000 learner scale when setting ROI expectations

options.label: Immediate (0-3 months)
options.description: Rapid compliance achievement to meet regulatory deadlines

options.label: Short-term (3-6 months)
options.description: Measurable reduction in incidents and improved audit scores

options.label: Medium-term (6-12 months)
options.description: Cultural shift and sustained behavioral change

questions.label: How will success be measured for your 26-50 person L&D team managing this initiative?
questions.helpText: Select KPIs that align with Healthcare industry standards and your organization's priorities

questions.label: Rate the strategic importance of this initiative to Regional Health System's organizational goals
questions.helpText: Consider your role as Learning Director and the impact of HIPAA compliance on patient safety and organizational risk

sections.title: Target Audience Analysis
sections.description: Deep dive into your 501-1000 learner characteristics to ensure personalized, accessible learning experiences

questions.label: What is the demographic composition of your 501-1000 healthcare workforce?
questions.helpText: Understanding role distribution helps tailor content depth and examples for Office, Remote/Home learning environments

options.label: Clinical Staff (Doctors, Nurses, Therapists)
options.description: Direct patient care providers who handle PHI daily

validation.message: Select at least one learner group

questions.label: What learning preferences dominate in your Healthcare organization?
questions.helpText: Given 3-5 hours per week availability, which format will maximize engagement for Mandatory compliance motivated learners?

questions.label: What accessibility requirements must be met for your workforce?
questions.helpText: HIPAA-compliant platforms accessed via Desktop, Laptop, Tablet must meet WCAG standards

questions.label: How will you segment the 501-1000 learners for personalized learning paths?
questions.helpText: With 2/5 average knowledge level, segmentation ensures appropriate content depth for each group

options.label: Role-Based Segmentation
options.description: Different paths for clinical, administrative, and IT staff

options.label: Knowledge-Level Segmentation
options.description: Adaptive paths based on pre-assessment scores

options.label: Department-Based Cohorts
options.description: Cohorts organized by department or unit

questions.label: Estimate the digital literacy level of your Healthcare workforce
questions.helpText: This affects platform selection and training complexity for Desktop, Laptop, Tablet usage
